1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Tokens in Koshucode.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Token.Token
7  (
8    -- * Subtype name
9    SubtypeName (..),
10
11    -- * Token
12    Token (..),
13    textToken,
14    unknownToken,
15
16    -- * Subtype
17    -- ** Text
18    TextForm (..),
19
20    -- ** Term
21    TermType (..),
22
23    -- ** Local
24    Local (..),
25    unlocal,
26
27    -- ** Blank
28    BlankName (..),
29  ) where
30
31import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base             as B
32import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol    as S
33
34-- | Type wihch has subtype and its name.
35class SubtypeName a where
36    subtypeName :: a -> String
37
38
39-- --------------------------------------------  Token type
40
41-- | There are eleven types of tokens.
42data Token
43    = TText     B.CodePt TextForm String
44                -- ^ 1) Text.
45    | TSlot     B.CodePt Int String
46                -- ^ 2) Slot name.
47                --      'Int' represents slot level, i.e.,
48                --      0 for local positional slots,
49                --      1 for local named slots,
50                --      2 for global slots
51                --      —  @\@@/name/
52    | TShort    B.CodePt String String
53                -- ^ 3) Prefixed shorten text — /short/@.@/proper/
54    | TTermN    B.CodePt Ordering S.TermName
55                -- ^ 4) Term name —  @\/@/name/
56    | TTerm     B.CodePt TermType S.TermPath
57                -- ^ 5) Term path — @\/@/name/@\/@/name/
58    | TLocal    B.CodePt (Local String) Int [Token]
59                -- ^ 6) Local name — @^\/@/name/
60    | TOpen     B.CodePt String
61                -- ^ 7) Opening bracket — @(@, @{@, etc
62    | TClose    B.CodePt String
63                -- ^ 8) Closing bracket — @}@, @)@, etc
64    | TSpace    B.CodePt Int
65                -- ^ 9) /N/ space characters.
66    | TComment  B.CodePt String
67                -- ^ 10) Comment — @**@/text/
68    | TName     B.CodePt BlankName
69                -- ^ 11) Blank name. (This is used in building content expression)
70    | TUnknown  B.CodePt String B.AbortReason
71                -- ^ 12) Unknown token.
72      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
73
74-- | @\"text\"@, @\"open\"@, ...
75instance SubtypeName Token where
76     subtypeName (TText     _ _ _  ) = "text"
77     subtypeName (TShort    _ _ _  ) = "short"
78     subtypeName (TTermN    _ _ _  ) = "term"
79     subtypeName (TTerm     _ _ _  ) = "term"
80     subtypeName (TLocal    _ _ _ _) = "local"
81     subtypeName (TSlot     _ _ _  ) = "slot"
82     subtypeName (TOpen     _ _    ) = "open"
83     subtypeName (TClose    _ _    ) = "close"
84     subtypeName (TSpace    _ _    ) = "space"
85     subtypeName (TComment  _ _    ) = "comment"
86     subtypeName (TName     _ _    ) = "name"
87     subtypeName (TUnknown  _ _ _  ) = "unknown"
88
89instance B.Name Token where
90    name (TTerm     _ _ ns)  = concat ns
91    name (TSlot      _ _ s)  = s
92    name (TText      _ _ s)  = s
93    name (TOpen        _ s)  = s
94    name (TClose       _ s)  = s
95    name (TComment     _ s)  = s
96    name x = error $ "unknown name: " ++ show x
97
98instance B.CodePtr Token where
99    codePtList (TText    cp _ _)    = [cp]
100    codePtList (TShort   cp _ _)    = [cp]
101    codePtList (TTermN   cp _ _)    = [cp]
102    codePtList (TTerm    cp _ _)    = [cp]
103    codePtList (TLocal   cp _ _ _)  = [cp]
104    codePtList (TSlot    cp _ _)    = [cp]
105    codePtList (TOpen    cp _)      = [cp]
106    codePtList (TClose   cp _)      = [cp]
107    codePtList (TSpace   cp _)      = [cp]
108    codePtList (TComment cp _)      = [cp]
109    codePtList (TName    cp _)      = [cp]
110    codePtList (TUnknown cp _ _)    = [cp]
111
112instance B.PPrint Token where
113    pprint = d where
114        d (TText      cp q w)    = pretty "TText"    cp [show q, show w]
115        d (TShort     cp a b)    = pretty "TShort"   cp [show a, show b]
116        d (TTermN     cp _ n)    = pretty "TTermN"   cp [show n]
117        d (TTerm      cp q ns)   = pretty "TTerm"    cp [show q, show ns]
118        d (TLocal     cp n _ _)  = pretty "TLocal"   cp [show n]
119        d (TSlot      cp n w)    = pretty "TSlot"    cp [show n, show w]
120        d (TOpen      cp p)      = pretty "TOpen"    cp [show p]
121        d (TClose     cp p)      = pretty "TClose"   cp [show p]
122        d (TSpace     cp c)      = pretty "TSpace"   cp [show c]
123        d (TComment   cp s)      = pretty "TComment" cp [show s]
124        d (TName      cp w)      = pretty "TName"    cp [show w]
125        d (TUnknown   cp w _)    = pretty "TUnknown" cp [show w]
126
127        pretty k cp xs         = B.pprintH $ lineCol cp : k : xs
128        lineCol cp             = (show $ B.codePtLineNo cp)
129                                 ++ "." ++ (show $ B.codePtColumnNo cp)
130
131-- | Create raw text token.
132textToken :: String -> Token
133textToken = TText B.def TextRaw
134
135-- | Create unknown token.
136unknownToken :: B.CodePt -> String -> B.Ab a -> Token
137unknownToken cp w (Left a)  = TUnknown cp w a
138unknownToken cp w (Right _) = TUnknown cp w $ B.abortBecause "bug?"
139
140
141-- --------------------------------------------  Subtype
142
143-- ----------------------  Text
144
145-- | Subtype of text token.
146data TextForm
147    = TextUnk      -- ^ Unknown keyword
148    | TextRaw      -- ^ Naked text
149    | TextQ        -- ^ Single-quoted text — @\'@/code/
150    | TextQQ       -- ^ Double-quoted text — @\"@/text/@\"@
151    | TextKey      -- ^ Keyword literal — @<@/keyword/@>@
152    | TextBar      -- ^ Text enclosed in bars — @|@/text/@|@
153    | TextLicense  -- ^ Text in license section
154      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
155
156-- | @\"raw\"@, @\"q\"@, ...
157instance SubtypeName TextForm where
158    subtypeName TextUnk      = "unknown"
159    subtypeName TextRaw      = "raw"
160    subtypeName TextQ        = "q"
161    subtypeName TextQQ       = "qq"
162    subtypeName TextKey      = "key"
163    subtypeName TextBar      = "bar"
164    subtypeName TextLicense  = "license"
165
166
167-- ----------------------  Term
168
169data TermType
170    = TermTypePath               -- ^ Normal term path
171    | TermTypeQuoted             -- ^ Quoted term name
172      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
173
174
175-- ----------------------  Local
176
177-- | Local reference.
178data Local a
179    = LocalSymbol a        -- ^ Reference to local relation — @^r@
180    | LocalNest a          -- ^ Reference to nested relation — @^/r@
181      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
182
183unlocal :: Local a -> a
184unlocal (LocalNest   a) = a
185unlocal (LocalSymbol a) = a
186
187
188-- ----------------------  Blank
189
190data BlankName
191    = BlankNormal   String
192    | BlankInternal String
193    | BlankPrefix   String
194    | BlankInfix    String
195    | BlankPostfix  String
196    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
197
198instance B.Name BlankName where
199    name (BlankNormal   n)   = n
200    name (BlankInternal n)   = n
201    name (BlankPrefix   n)   = n
202    name (BlankInfix    n)   = n
203    name (BlankPostfix  n)   = n
204
205-- | @\"normal\"@, @\"internal\"@, ...
206instance SubtypeName BlankName where
207    subtypeName (BlankNormal   _) = "normal"
208    subtypeName (BlankInternal _) = "internal"
209    subtypeName (BlankPrefix   _) = "prefix"
210    subtypeName (BlankInfix    _) = "infix"
211    subtypeName (BlankPostfix  _) = "postfix"
212
